name: Platfighters 2
description:
Platfighters 2 is the highly anticipated sequel to the original Platfighters fighting game. This game has updated graphics, powerups and more! Play this game with all your friends (oh wait, you don't have any).

Instructions:

- Player 1 uses WASD keys to move

- Player 2 uses arrow keys to move

- Press down to attack

- Collect the colorful powerups that fall from the sky

- Be careful, some maps have a deadly drop

Powerups:

- Green Shield makes you invincible

- Orange Fire gives you ranged attacks

- Blue Arrow gives you a speed boost

Keep in mind that powerups do not last forever, only 10 seconds. You have 3 squares underneath your health, if one of them is lit up, you are using a powerup. This game can only be played with two people, there is no single player mode. 

!!!  All glitches and bugs are intentional! If you find one, do not complain, we did it on purpose  !!!

Credits:

- Graphics made by me in Piskelapp

- Coding done by me in Scratch
